Milestone.1: Wisden India's Highest Impact Test Batsman
Milestone.2: Padma Bhushan – India's third highest civilian award
Milestone.3: Don Bradman Award with Glenn McGrath
Milestone.4: NDTV Indian of the Year's Lifetime Achievement Award with Dev Anand
Milestone.5: Captain of the ICC's Test Team
Milestone.6: Padma Shri – India's fourth highest civilian award
Milestone.7: ICC Cricketer of the year – Highest award in the ICC listings
Milestone.8: ICC Test Player of The Year, ICC Cricketer of The Year MTV Youth Icon of the Year
Milestone.9: Dravid was one of the five cricketers selected as Wisden Cricketer of the Year
Milestone.10: CEAT International Cricketer of the World Cup
Milestone.11: Arjuna Award recipient for achievements in cricket
